website_summaries.verdict: Nuva Spa’s formula deeply moisturizes without breaking the bank.
pros: A fast-drying formula that goes on and comes off with ease
Users love the light, sweet scent, and fast results
Skin is noticeable brighter and softer after only a few uses
cons: A few users complained that the mask stained their faces

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this face mask!! ❤
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product!! I sell a popular brand of beauty products and face masks, but I tried this one and it works amazingly well! I was skeptical that it would, but it really does! Leaves my face feeling super soft and clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmiep1980

customer_reviews.title: Hello Natural Glow
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a mud mask before, but I knew how well Nuva Spa worked so I gave this one a try. It was so easy to spread onto my face and took only 5 minutes to dry. I used warm water to take it off and WOW! My face looked and felt so smooth. After two weeks of every three day use the dead skin was gone and my face was rejuvenated.
customer_reviews.author: Mumof2byz

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I have super dry skin so after I was done I had to use lotion! It has a tingling feeling when it’s first on but it goes away! I’d use a wash cloth to wash it off and a spatula to apply because it can get messy! My skin never felt better though! Use it about three times a week and you’ll be good.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Has a wonderful light perfume scent. Im usually not someone to get anything "scented " , but this wasvery pleasant. My face felt cleaner and wasn't irritated at all by the mask which for someone with sensitive skin is truly amazing! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NandA S.

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: I tried two other mud masks before and this is by far the best. I’ve only used it once so far and was satisfied with how it left my skin looking and feeling. I only used a thin layer and allowed it to dry for 15-20 minutes. Rinsing it off takes some persistence. When it was finally off, my face was so smooth I didn’t even need to use a moisturizer. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Edon Ben-Artzi

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combination/sensitive skin. I used this mask for a week now and it has made my skin very irritated with flared up itchy patches on skin. The first time I used it, I felt a tingly "burning" (very mild) sensation on my face while it dries, washed it off and my face looks nice and even-toned. The next day, same routine, my face gotten progressively more irritated each time I used it. My face had red patches of uncontrollable itchy dried skin that my moisturizers couldn't calm down. After 3 days of not using it, my skin is slowing going back to the way it was, less irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Hng

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, left skin soft
customer_reviews.text: First thought when I opened it was that it smelled good. I used it today and it goes in very silky smooth I do wish it came with a brush to apply it so I don't feel like I'm waiting it. It dries fast witch is nice so you not waiting forever. My skin on my face has always been really dry and flaky. When I washed it off I used a wash cloth because it was a little hard to get off. I put on a moisturizer right after and my face is so soft and my forehead isn't all flaky. This dead sea mud mask will definitely become part of my face wash routine.
customer_reviews.author: vickie rumbold

customer_reviews.title: It has more clay than dead sea mud
customer_reviews.text: Well, this definitely isn't all dead sea mud. This has some other stuff mixed with it. It's a lighter color than regular dead sea mud and dries differently. It's not really a bad product but I would not have bought it if I'd known this. I won't buy it again. They should take "dead sea" out of the product label. Kinda misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing mask
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used this it felt really cool and refreshing. It does take some time to dry (more than the 5 minutes it says on the box) and takes a lot of rubbing to wash off so I use a face scrub. The second time I had makeup that I just washed off with a cleanser roughly and I was sweaty all day, so after a minute it kinda started to sting. I use it 3x a week and it’s just nice to have a “spa” time as a new mom. This is part of my skin care routine now. One downside is that is does dry me out so moisturizer is a must afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Not for my skin type
customer_reviews.text: I extremely disliked that this face mask said it was good for acne and blackheads; it made my skin breakout worse and made my black heads worse. The only good things were that it made my skin soft and moisturized. It was just not good for my skin type. I would guess that I have combination .... my skins normally soft and gets dry every now and then but always the same spot, and very acne prone, but I only get moderate acne.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mud Mask. Face feels so nice
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product and it feels so nice on my skin. Even better after you wash it off. I used a warm cloth to wash off. My face feels smooth and cleaner. I'm turning 50 in April and people always compliment me on my skin. This product is nice and I'm going to keep using it. Maybe it will start turning back time lol.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo Denning

customer_reviews.title: Stains face black
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. It was so smooth and creamy, smelled great and felt great on my skin! Left on for 7 minutes instead of 5 and it STAINED MY FACE BLACK. I’m not even kidding. I had to SCRUB my skin with a rough wash cloth for like 5 minutes to get it off and I still couldn’t. The only way I did was to use my makeup removing melting balm, let it sit for a few minutes and then scrub THAT off. It was awful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good for clean and moisture, but may be tingly
customer_reviews.text: I usually have oily acne prone skin but this winter has my skin extra dry! I loved that I can keep it on for 5 min and it got the job done, face felt clean and moisturizer! The one con I have is the tingly burning feeling I felt for about a minute each use however it did not leave my face red or anything. My sister used it and she had no tingly sensation so I guess if you have very sensitive skin be cautious
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: My girls and I love doing face masks throughout the week. While I love this one, it is SO messy. We make a mess rinsing it off, no matter how we do it. But it still is great and feels great after using it.
customer_reviews.author: heatherlynn620

customer_reviews.title: It is a mask
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It doesn't really dry out as you expect a mask to do but the benefits are great. This along with their retinol creams has done wonders for my skin. Love it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I had different mud masks but thicker and darker. This one doesn’t seem pure mud. But it works okay. It’s better than nothing. When I clean my face with water, gray mud washed away but leave some black stuff. I have to use soup to clean them. I still don’t know where black stuffs came from. I think they mixed with some chemicals or something. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having horrible break outs. I started using this as soon as I got it, twice a week, so four uses now. My break out is almost completely gone! You can notice a difference within the first use, at least MY skin was much softer and seemed brighter and healthier. Im not a huge fan of the smell, It kind of reminds me of old floral perfume but it's not overbearing and most people think it smells nice. All in all the mask is great. It's super relaxing, doesn't make your skin feel tight afterwards, and it works. You can use this every other day, it's not harsh on your skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Haili P.

customer_reviews.title: Use sparingly or it takes forever to dry. Super gentle.
customer_reviews.text: I loved that a little bit went a long ways. Also that it was gentle enough for my 4yo to use it with me. She had a blast
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Burns my skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my face for 10 seconds and had to take it completely off burned so bad would not use or recommend i don’t even have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Angela Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product has severely helped with my acne break out while wearing a masks all day long. Will definitely make future purchases again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen C.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say that I’ve seen any dramatic results from this product, as I’ve just started implementing this into my routine. However, the mask itself feels quite nice and does not have a horrendous odor to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product,good value for price.works well on damaged skin.chemical exposure during military service.am grateful.thank you.
customer_reviews.author: steven r. price

customer_reviews.title: wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many face masks this is by far the best one yet! It dried up some acne I swear over night. My skin is so soft after washing it off it’s amazing! The smell is so light. I leave it on a little longer than the 10 minutes in the directions, as it takes a bit longer to dry. I go about 15 minutes. It’s great!!!!! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Olsavsky

customer_reviews.title: Auch!
customer_reviews.text: It started to burn when I put it on my face after 10sec of the application. Never used it again
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Burning sensation
customer_reviews.text: It burns :'( my face isn't normally sensitive but this masks irritates my skin
customer_reviews.author: MsEmber

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It’s a great mask to put on and to just relax in. It doesn’t burn. It does tingle a little bit but it’s not overwhelming. There’s a lot of product and a little bit goes a long way! The price is really great for the amount and qualify of product you get.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrstin L

customer_reviews.title: Grey face
customer_reviews.text: The mask leaves your face grey! You have to wash your face several times in order for it to come off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stained my face grey!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars, I would. This stuff literally stained my face grey! Was not moisturizing at all. Burned the second I put it on. Left a terrible film on my face and complete STAINED my face!! Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It works great, makes my skin feel great, and it really goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: leaves your face smooth
customer_reviews.text: i think it works great. my roommate and i both tried it. she thinks it left our faces looking smooth and soft
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Lackey

customer_reviews.title: it makes your skin soft
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my face and it made my face super soft and it got ride of a lot of dead skin. I like the way it made my skin feel after no greasy feel either. A little dry but lotion helps with that. I like how it made me feel relaxed
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Longstreet

customer_reviews.title: Messy but great product!
customer_reviews.text: Messy (use in the shower). Works really well and makes my face nice and clean. I use it once a week and haven’t had any pimples!
customer_reviews.author: Meri Kassner

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I just think your getting a mask worth it’s price because I don’t know it just seems and feels a little cheap. Eventhough It made my skin somewhat softer, it was different from other masks I’ve had before eventhough they been cheap they were good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Recommend It!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! I have very sensitive skin and get really bad breakouts at times. This mask helps clear the breakouts fast and keeps them from happening so harshly. It leaves your skin feeling so smooth afterwards. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sallamaj

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well & as stated it would. One thing I recommend is a brush or spatula to apply the mask. It doesn't leave the skin excessively dry, but I do apply a facial moisturizer after using. It doesn't wash off very easily, most masks don't, but if you use a nice washcloth, it makes it quicker & less messy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

customer_reviews.title: BEST MASK EVER !
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask was the best iv ever used. It left my face feeling so smooth and clean and didn’t dry out my skin. I let my Mom try some and she loved it too. It’s a little messy but so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It’s wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. This makes doesn’t irritate my skin which is fantastic. It made my face so soft. It also helped with my redness a bit. I highly recommend. I use it once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Pickering

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GET THIS IF YOU HAVE SENSITIVE SKIN
customer_reviews.text: do not get this product if you have sensitive skin. as soon as i put it on my face it started burning. i couldn't even have it on for a minute. before the burning was so bad. i had to wash it off almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Joette

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Even after one use I noticed a difference in the blackheads on my nose. It really seemed to pull out the impurities and I have a very stubborn nose. So I am happy I actually got to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Marin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.text: I applied this to my hand and let it sit for 5 minutes, when I removed it i notice it left me a dark stain and I had to scrub this hard to remove it, good thing I didnt use on the face. Disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Stone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in just a couple days!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The effects feel amazing and leaves your face feeling cool and soft at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Téa

customer_reviews.title: Burned
customer_reviews.text: I loved using this mask but the only thing is that it would burn my skin while it was on.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Walther

customer_reviews.title: great for face
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for the past couple weeks and its been making my face feel great.
customer_reviews.author: loretta

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: It did not have any effects after a month use.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmadreza Homayouni

customer_reviews.title: Nice and clean
customer_reviews.text: This works really good but for me my face had to be all the way dry after washing it BEFORE using other wise it burned
customer_reviews.author: kaytlin vale

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice does not take 10 mins to dry
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice mud mask! Takes a lot longer than 10 mins to dry but it does leave you face feeling refreshed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was awesome. It definitely made my face feel really clean and soft. I’d definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Lollar

customer_reviews.title: Really does help with acne.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the only thing that has helped me with my acne. It feels great and it makes my skin soft. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mud mask!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how clean this midnight mask made my face fee after using it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cmreynolds431

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mud mask! Made my sling feel amazing after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: A&CBarnes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Love this product already just used it and makes my face feel so soft and glowing! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good price
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t solve all my skins problems but it sure does help with oil and blackheads!
customer_reviews.author: Laura McBride

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped clear my skin. The mask felt good and I would definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Like this products it feels nice to apply and it makes my skin nice and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth mud mask!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell and smooth creamy feel of this mud mask! Definitely a great buy would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Roben M.

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask!
customer_reviews.text: I felt that it got my face super clean and all the dead skin off without drying my face out.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I know some have said they didn’t like this product but I have enjoyed it. I use it twice a week and my skin feels tighter, smoother and fresher. It’s easy to apply and it comes off very easily with a warm wet washcloth. Plus it scares my husband so that’s a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rule

customer_reviews.title: Tingley clean skin
customer_reviews.text: Item was packaged well upon arrival. Has a pleasant light scent. The directions say to leave for five mins to let dry but it didn't dry but I'm also not sure it is supposed to dry completely. Has a tingley feeling while on. Had some difficulty getting it off my skin especially my hands. My skin was soft and didnt feel tight after I washed it off.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Schecter

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and feels so refreshing
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite "me-time" activities is face masks. I even have my super fabulous unicorn headband for masking! This mask is great! It's tingling and cool on my skin, the mixture is easy to apply and it doesn't have any overwhelming fragrances which I'm happy about. It has a light, yummy smell. After washing this off my skin feels soft and looks brighter. Plus a little goes a long way so I know I'll get a lot of uses out of this container.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona McNally

customer_reviews.title: It’s a nice face mask
customer_reviews.text: Contains a lot of product. A little goes a long way. It seems like a nice product and doesn’t smell chemically to me. I don’t have a lot of acne or anything, so I don’t know how well it would help with that and I don’t see any difference with blackheads. It doesn’t over dry my skin and my face feels extra clean after using it, so I believe it’s a good detox mask. I use it every other day and I have no issues. Which is interesting since my skin is actually really sensitive to a lot of products. It was a good purchase for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Stings and Burns My Face
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of other brands of Dead Sea mud mask, but none of them sting like this one does! I'm not sure which of the MANY added ingredients is responsible, but definitely check out the ingredient list before buying. This product has more additives than most other brands of DSMM. And if you have sensitive skin, as I do, I would avoid this particular brand.
customer_reviews.author: IfYouWantMyOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Add it to your collection!! (unless you have sensitive skin)
customer_reviews.text: Although when you first apply it, it burns a bit, this mask is quite nice! Especially for the price!! A little bit goes such a long way, and it smells delightful. It does take a bit longer than instructed to dry, so be warned!!! I know my friends have stolen it from me before hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Momma Boo

customer_reviews.title: Not for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this stuff and have tried other mud masks in the past. This one started burning my skin after having it on for five minutes. I had to take it off for fear of how my skin would keep reacting to it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Craig

customer_reviews.title: tingly and fresh feeling
customer_reviews.text: Tried the mask and it has a tingly fresh feeling, liked the scent and the exfoliating once I took it off, i recommend following with a moisturizer but I enjoyed the product and the process, nice to pamper myself a little!
customer_reviews.author: Noe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This mask goes on so clean and smooth! Most masks I've tried glump together and it takes a little extra work to spread around. But this, you don't need a lot and or spreads so evenly all over.
customer_reviews.author: Embj25

customer_reviews.title: cleansing
customer_reviews.text: This is very good for your skin and helps pull out impurities. I would recommend that more people use this product to keep their skin clear and to pull out imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stuff
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I applied this to my face, it burned and I washed it off. It might work for some but it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: joana joe daou

customer_reviews.title: Good for the acne
customer_reviews.text: Daughter says it's a good mask and her face has started to clear up as well. She's happy, so that's good!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, didn't irritate my acne prone skin, my skin is oily and it hydrated without making it more oily. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stone

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for 3 months now. I love the way it feels and how it makes my skin feel. So easy to put on and leaves my face feeling so soft and looking good. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! This is a must try for anyone looking for a great feeling mask.
customer_reviews.author: Josh F

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this. I use it often and it really helps with break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Mask
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have sensitive skin and this did not make me break out.
customer_reviews.author: Moon child 🌙

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing mud mask
customer_reviews.text: Great face mud mask that didn't irritate my skin. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Clean and fresh
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, easy to manage and leave skin fresh and clean
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent, appealing look and great texture easily applied to face and neck, it only needs few minutes to stay on the face after which can be rinse off. Face becomes gentle and moist after this mask, the effect is seen minutes after the procedure. Definitely will try it again.
customer_reviews.author: yosip

product_meta.title: Nuva Spa: Dead Sea Mud Mask for Face Acne, Oily Skin & Blackheads – Wash-Off Dead Sea Face Mask – Natural Moisturizing Mineral Cleanser Treatment Reduces Facial Pores
feature_bullets: EXFOLIATE, CLEANSE & DETOXIFY: Nuva Spa's Dead Sea Mud Mask removes toxins, oils and dead cells from the skin. The mud face mask leaves skin fresh, soft, clear and radiant.
DEAD SEA MUD: Face mask contains natural minerals like magnesium, calcium, sulfur, bromide, iodine, sodium, zinc and potassium to moisturize skin and stimulate facial circulation.
BLACKHEAD & ACNE TREATMENT: The intensive deep facial cleanser is an essential skin care treatment for acne and blackhead prone facial skin, for clear pores and skin that looks its best.
EASY TO USE: Apply the moisturizing dead sea face mask, allow to dry and wash off – a quick, easy and effective addition to your weekly skin care and beauty routine.
THE NUVA GUARANTEE: All of our products come with a 100% satisfaction guarantee - just contact us if for any reason you’re not happy with your purchase.
